TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_lye-neyti-al, title = lye-neyti-al, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/lye-neyti-al} }

S.FORM: == kakiliman == lye-ney.ti-al "kamu nu Ba, René Descartes, La-tin-hwa, Renatus Cartesius,1596 a mihca 3 a bulad 31 a demiad-1650 a mihca 2 abulad 11 a demiad" cacay u Ba-kow ce-cye-cya, su-sye-cya at uke-sye-cya. i He-lan masakaputay a kanatal tiniami ku nikauzip kawa niza, saayaway sakay na-saw-te-maw-ce a He-lan kanatal a hitay,Aw-lan-ce-a hungti atu He-lan mikawaway tu sakuwan. mala He-lan nu kasatiman a ziday u singanganay nu sipunu'ay a tademaw, ci Ti-ka-al musakamu amin hizasa ayzaay a ziday ce-syw atu mipudacay tu pinaay nu saayaway misabaluhay misanga' a tademaw. nikauzipan 1596 a mihcaan ci Ti-ka-al lecuh i Hwa-kow-an-te-al-low-ya-al-a kuwanan nu Tu-lay-na-la-hay "ayza sumad han ci Ti-ka-al a mikineng tuyni kasenengan a tademaw". caay ku kakitaan a labu nu lumma' ciniza, wama Joachim u Ley-en-a Pu-li-ta-si a ginging. cacay henay ku mihcaan u wina mahaykaku mapatay, ciniza satu malalid tu, malawacu ku uzzip yadah ku imelang. mapatay ku ina zikaz, wama niza malimad munen zumaay a niyazu' siacawa aca, subelid han pabeli tu bai niza tu ku pahabanay ci Ti-ka-alan, namahiza malawama caay tu kasuazih, nika u wama pabeli tu kalisiw miedap, kya taneng a kapah ku nipasubana', milunguc tu kanamuhan nu uzip a caay kabuyalaw tu kasikeyza a munday. 1596年, ,父親Joachim . 1622 a mihcaan, yu 26 ku mihcaan hawsa, ci Ti-ka-al pacakay tu nisubelidan nu wama tu zaysang, 4 pat a mihcaan miliwku tu Ow-cow, zuma i I-ta-li 2 a mihcaan ku eneng, kilul mabulaw tayza i Pa-li. i Pa-li amatineng tu ci Ma-lan.mey-sen, Mey-sen i 1624 atu 1625 a mihcaan tahkal ku tusa a nisangaan tu lun-tan, paculiay sakay paydangay mipaculi tu pabaliway a zizateng. zikuz Ti-ka-al a "nizateng a sulit" uyza sinmung matatengil kuyni tusaay a angangan. zikuz miliyas tu Pa-li, ci Mey-sen mahiza sanisani pakatineng tu kacakat nu lun-tan. Ti-al-ka a sinziya tatiedan i sye-suan makibisien malaalaw a musakamu. pangiha ciniza masalucud tu Lu-ma tin-cu-cyaw atu "kesem mizateng" amuti u sakay midiput tu ciwlu a tatiedan. nika i ziday niza ci Ti-ka-al makukesu patiyak tu kaliyuhan a tahakaya sen-lun atu u-sen-lun a tatiedan. tulecad a zidayan niza ci Pu-lay-ce.Pa-s-ka-al sakamu sa "caay pisulul kaku ci Ti-ka-alan, ciniza i hamin nu ce-syean maydah a miliyas tu kakalayan. saca la'cus aca amakai tu kakalayan atayni mitiyung cinizaan, i kitakitay lekal a miundu, caay kuyni dada', acaay tu pikilul tu kakalayan ciniza". Ti-ka-al i ced-syean tabaki ku nikalilid, zuma u katinengan nu katuuday, angangan nu singanganay ciza "mizateng kaku sisa izaw kaku". tatenngaay, i sin-sang-syean ciniza, katineng pitengil, kawaw pitengil i mahiniay tabaki ku pacuwahan, katukah ayza ku kalilid. . sakay su-sye atu pacuwahan nu likisi Ti-ka-al sakay su-sye u kahenulan a pacuwahan u patizengay tu pihulak misaheci apina. ci Ti-ka-al maleku yu mahamin malaliyas a kutay tu sulit atu pina ku pulung nu nisulit. i pisulit niza "pina"ay, ci Ti-ka-al pawacay tu i hekalay, pina a munday taneng tungus mala kutay a silit a munday, taneng nikaawas tu kutay a sulit paniyul amaazih, pawacay pina ku kasahini. ci Ti-ka-al pacumud tu cuo-pya-si atu syen-twan a nizateng muasip. ci Ti-ka-al i su-sye a laluudan sakayiluc i wi-ci-benan kawaw pawapen tu tanektekay a angangan, u zikuzay a tademaw nu ayzaay a angangan nu su-sye. Pabaluhay ciniza tu pinaay a kasabacu "cwan-yi" tay-su-hwang-cen-se, makay tu pina a muntay u ta-su a kawaw mihulak, uyni ayza a demiaday pisaheci tu pina " anucaay pangangancow-pyaw pina". caay kuyni dada' ayza picukaymas yadah ku su-sye bacu hatu ni Ti-ka-al saayaway a nicukaymasan, uyni pasu katinengan tu sulit a,b,c atu cay katinengan a sulit x,y,z, izaw henay ce-suay a kasahini. a maazih henay niza ku tahkalay lilis nu hekal, tukun, hekalay a kacacayat, pangangan han nu iluc Ow-la-ti-ka-al a kung-s. iza henay wi-ci-benan hinamaazihay Ta-ka-al masapapahay a kiliw ciniza tu ku pakaazihay. 此外, a, b, c以及未知數x, y, z等, .

== kakiliman == lye-ney.ti-al "kamo no Ba, René Descartes, La-tin-hwa, Renatos Cartesios,1596 a mihca 3 a bolad 31 a demiad-1650 a mihca 2 abolad 11 a demiad" cacay o Ba-kow ce-cye-cya, so-sye-cya at oke-sye-cya. i He-lan masakapotay a kanatal tiniami ko nikaozip kawa niza, saayaway sakay na-saw-te-maw-ce a He-lan kanatal a hitay,Aw-lan-ce-a hongti ato He-lan mikawaway to sakowan. mala He-lan no kasatiman a ziday o singanganay no sipono'ay a tademaw, ci Ti-ka-al mosakamo amin hizasa ayzaay a ziday ce-syw ato mipodacay to pinaay no saayaway misabalohay misanga' a tademaw. nikaozipan 1596 a mihcaan ci Ti-ka-al lecoh i Hwa-kow-an-te-al-low-ya-al-a kowanan no To-lay-na-la-hay "ayza somad han ci Ti-ka-al a mikineng toyni kasenengan a tademaw". caay ko kakitaan a labo no lomma' ciniza, wama Joachim o Ley-en-a Po-li-ta-si a ginging. cacay henay ko mihcaan o wina mahaykako mapatay, ciniza sato malalid to, malawaco ko ozzip yadah ko imelang. mapatay ko ina zikaz, wama niza malimad monen zomaay a niyazo' siacawa aca, sobelid han pabeli to bai niza to ko pahabanay ci Ti-ka-alan, namahiza malawama caay to kasoazih, nika o wama pabeli to kalisiw miedap, kya taneng a kapah ko nipasobana', milongoc to kanamohan no ozip a caay kaboyalaw to kasikeyza a monday. 1596年, ,父親Joachim . 1622 a mihcaan, yo 26 ko mihcaan hawsa, ci Ti-ka-al pacakay to nisobelidan no wama to zaysang, 4 pat a mihcaan miliwko to Ow-cow, zoma i I-ta-li 2 a mihcaan ko eneng, kilol mabolaw tayza i Pa-li. i Pa-li amatineng to ci Ma-lan.mey-sen, Mey-sen i 1624 ato 1625 a mihcaan tahkal ko tosa a nisangaan to lon-tan, pacoliay sakay paydangay mipacoli to pabaliway a zizateng. zikoz Ti-ka-al a "nizateng a solit" oyza sinmong matatengil koyni tosaay a angangan. zikoz miliyas to Pa-li, ci Mey-sen mahiza sanisani pakatineng to kacakat no lon-tan. Ti-al-ka a sinziya tatiedan i sye-soan makibisien malaalaw a mosakamo. pangiha ciniza masalocod to Lo-ma tin-co-cyaw ato "kesem mizateng" amoti o sakay midipot to ciwlo a tatiedan. nika i ziday niza ci Ti-ka-al makokeso patiyak to kaliyohan a tahakaya sen-lon ato o-sen-lon a tatiedan. tolecad a zidayan niza ci Po-lay-ce.Pa-s-ka-al sakamo sa "caay pisolol kako ci Ti-ka-alan, ciniza i hamin no ce-syean maydah a miliyas to kakalayan. saca la'cos aca amakai to kakalayan atayni mitiyong cinizaan, i kitakitay lekal a miondo, caay koyni dada', acaay to pikilol to kakalayan ciniza". Ti-ka-al i ced-syean tabaki ko nikalilid, zoma o katinengan no katooday, angangan no singanganay ciza "mizateng kako sisa izaw kako". tatenngaay, i sin-sang-syean ciniza, katineng pitengil, kawaw pitengil i mahiniay tabaki ko pacowahan, katokah ayza ko kalilid. . sakay so-sye ato pacowahan no likisi Ti-ka-al sakay so-sye o kahenolan a pacowahan o patizengay to piholak misaheci apina. ci Ti-ka-al maleko yo mahamin malaliyas a kotay to solit ato pina ko polong no nisolit. i pisolit niza "pina"ay, ci Ti-ka-al pawacay to i hekalay, pina a monday taneng tongos mala kotay a silit a monday, taneng nikaawas to kotay a solit paniyol amaazih, pawacay pina ko kasahini. ci Ti-ka-al pacomod to coo-pya-si ato syen-twan a nizateng moasip. ci Ti-ka-al i so-sye a laloodan sakayiloc i wi-ci-benan kawaw pawapen to tanektekay a angangan, o zikozay a tademaw no ayzaay a angangan no so-sye. Pabalohay ciniza to pinaay a kasabaco "cwan-yi" tay-so-hwang-cen-se, makay to pina a montay o ta-so a kawaw miholak, oyni ayza a demiaday pisaheci to pina " anocaay pangangancow-pyaw pina". caay koyni dada' ayza picokaymas yadah ko so-sye baco hato ni Ti-ka-al saayaway a nicokaymasan, oyni paso katinengan to solit a,b,c ato cay katinengan a solit x,y,z, izaw henay ce-soay a kasahini. a maazih henay niza ko tahkalay lilis no hekal, tokon, hekalay a kacacayat, pangangan han no iloc Ow-la-ti-ka-al a kong-s. iza henay wi-ci-benan hinamaazihay Ta-ka-al masapapahay a kiliw ciniza to ko pakaazihay. 此外, a, b, c以及未知數x, y, z等, .
